title: Crash Course in Crisis Leadership
itunes:title: Crash Course in Crisis Leadership
description:
Erika H. James, Dean of the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania, discusses her book The Prepared Leader: Emerge from Any Crisis More Resilient Than Before.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
